testsuite.name: Scenario: Disable Self Registration

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
When I navigate to the System Settings page
When I set Allow Self Registration checkbox to unchecked
When I submit the changes to System Settings
Then The changes to System Settings were successfully saved.
Then The Allow Self Registration checkbox is unchecked
